message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. It's a great price considering the product's value and quality.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can you consider a price of $125? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I think the product's value justifies a higher price. How about we meet at $130? It's a fair compromise.
I'm getting close to considering your offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $128? I'm willing to make one more compromise.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $132? It's a good price considering the product's value and I think you'll be happy with it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $129? I'm really close to walking away, but I think this product could be a great fit for me.

I can see you're really serious about this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $131? It's a good price, and I think you'll be happy with it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm really close to walking away. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time. Can you meet me at $130? If not, I'll have to consider buying from John.
